title: Minicamp Updates: Tua struggles but does it really matter? Xavien Howard & Jamal Adams both absent, Bears commit to Andy Dalton for Week 1 (Football 6/16)
description:
The minicamp updates continue as Cody Benjamin joins Will Brinson to break down the most pressing news from Tuesday. And while we must admit we shouldn't put too much stock into June practice, it was eye-catching to see that Tua Tagovailoa threw 5 interceptions (4:00). What are we expecting out of the 2nd-year QB? None of those picks went to Xavien Howard and that's because the All Pro corner is skipping out on minicamp for the Dolphins as he aims for a new contract (10:45). Jamal Adams was also missing for the Seahawks, albeit with an excused absence. Still, Adams also wants a new deal (19:30). And Matt Nagy has committed to Andy Dalton...For now. How long until we see Justin Fields take meaningful snaps (28:00)?

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
